ygData.subject: Sphink gets a plan
ygData.msgSnippet: Sphink dawned on soemthing. With megs out of the jamming zone he could not make any scans into the jamming zone. The hologram set up to trick the alliance was

Subject: Sphink gets a plan
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

Sphink dawned on soemthing. With megs out of the jamming zone he could not 
make any scans into the jamming zone. The hologram set up to trick the 
alliance was still up and megs had never known of it. So when they entered 
the jamming zone they would only pick up the hologram ship's signal. Leading 
them to the fake ship. Giving the opportunity to jump them....... It was 
perfect. He sent a transmission forcefield around the ship. Unforunatly this 
meant No trans good come in or out. To keep the ships signal off screen. So 
now when Hell beast and megs enter they will be lead to a fake ship. Right 
before the shield went up he sent a comm to killfest explaing the plan and 
how no more comms in or out could be sent. he advised a call to magma to aid 
troops would be in good mind. And then there was complete radio silence.
